name: BlitzBot
description:
BlitzBot transports you back to the arcade era, providing a minimalist gaming experience reminiscent of quick moments of joy. Dive into short and dynamic sessions that encourage you to jump back in swiftly, capturing the charm of video game demos found in magazines, offering a brief yet irresistible duration—perfect for spontaneous moments of enjoyment.

The game aims to provide enjoyment through simple gameplay mechanics and streamlined controls, bringing back the simplicity of entertainment inherent in arcade games. Take hold of your controller and dive instantly into the fun.


Immerse yourself in the authentic experience of the "arcade" mode with BlitzBot, where you directly challenge your opponent within a selection of 3 arenas, each accompanied by its catchy music. Whether against the AI or with a friend in local PvP mode exclusively.

Before each game starts, customize your experience by choosing the difficulty, the number of rounds and the required points to win each round.
  • With three difficulty levels, BlitzBot provides enjoyment for all types of players, from the younger ones to the more experienced.
  • The average duration of a match is approximately 10 minutes (based on the default settings, which are 3 rounds of 7 points), ensuring intense and fast-paced gaming moments.


Frantic action blends with simplicity, featuring only three control mechanics: skillfully move your robot, master the smash, and engage in swift movements with the dash.

  • Dash
Use the dash to save delicate situations or thwart an imminent goal. By spending a dash unit, propel yourself in the desired direction, follow up with a smash, and send the puck back into the opponent's zone.

  • Smash and Super-smash
by holding down the dedicated button, you can send the puck back with increased force. The longer you hold, the more powerful the smash becomes, reaching its peak as it transforms into a super-smash.

  • Mega-smash
Each player has a mega-smash gauge that fills up with each collection of an energy orb on their color slot or by performing a smash (a super-smash further fills the gauge).

The race for the mega-smash becomes a true battle; each smash or super smash increases your gauge while decreasing your opponent's. When the gauge reaches its maximum, the super-smash transforms into a mega-smash, allowing you to project the puck devastatingly towards one of the goals.

Although the mega-smash moves at a high speed, countering it by executing a well-timed smash is not impossible. Succeeding in this maneuver will completely fill your gauge by retrieving your opponent's mega-smash.

  • Special Orb
Gain the upper hand during the match by seizing special orbs. At regular intervals, a special orb appears. If you collect it, it can grant you a temporary advantage, such as increasing your movement speed or slowing down your opponent's.

However, be cautious, as it can sometimes bring surprises and turn against you.


Immerse yourself in nostalgia with the retro filter mode that simulates the effect of old arcade cabinet screens. Perfect for retro enthusiasts and those nostalgic for classic arcade games!

Get ready for the frenetic action of BlitzBot!
